Definition at line 57 of file Hamiltonian.c.

References SlaterDet::A, calcPotentialHF(), calcTCMHF(), calcTHF(), Interaction::cm, k, and m.

Referenced by main().

{
  int A=Q->A;
  complex double t[A*A];
  complex double tcm[A*A];
  complex double v[A*A];

  calcTHF(Q, X, t);
  if (Int->cm)
    calcTCMHF(Q, X, tcm);
  calcPotentialHF(Int, Q, X, v);

  complex double *h = mes;
  int k,m;

  for (m=0; m<A; m++)
    for (k=0; k<A; k++) {
      h[k+m*A] = t[k+m*A] + v[k+m*A];
      if (Int->cm)
        h[k+m*A] -= tcm[k+m*A];
    }
}
